about_the_game:
Skiing VR - Be on the move!


Skiing VR is a sports simulator for playing with friends and random people over the network. The game will appeal to people who like to combine business with pleasure. Try to drive up the hill with our level of ski control implementation, it's a real challenge for the player. In Skiing VR you can take part in a real ski race!

Go down the slope, collect coins, avoid obstacles and do not forget to look around, otherwise you can end up in a tree or much worse ... to restart the race, for example. Overtake your opponent and show hardcore on the track! Collect coins as you move to get the maximum advantage in the race and emerge victorious from the race.

Skiing VR is based on the mechanics of real ski movement, where the player uses sticks like ski poles and head bends to guide the movement. This simple functionality provides the game with maximum realism, replayability and brings a huge share of excitement to the gameplay.

Game features:
  • Competitive passion.
  • Compete with your friends and see who gets the most points! Become a winner!
  • The ski track is full of surprises, bonuses and dangers, as well as wild animals.
  • Stylish graphics that will not leave anyone indifferent.

The game controls are simple and straightforward. Ski poles are an extension of your hands, a turn of your head is a direction of movement! What could be easier!

Experience the frosty sensations of the most controversial ski simulator!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD® Radeon® R9 290X 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A 64-bit processor and operating system are required
